articles.title: Biden, Xi Jinping's 2 Hour 17 Minute Phone Call On Taiwan, Trade Dispute
articles.description: President Joe Biden and Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping spoke by phone for well over two hours on Thursday on mounting tensions over Taiwan, a festering trade dispute and their bid to keep the superpower rivalry in check.
articles.content:
This was Biden's fifth talk with Xi since becoming president a year and a half ago
